original_title: Il diario segreto delle due principesse
overview: Two princesses, from one of the most famous royal families, recount in detail their countless sexual adventures. Their address books filled with prestigious names from the international Jet Set open the doors to all kinds of excess and unbridled erotic experiences. Big names of this world, actors, journalists, men and women, all participate in their crazy life of debauchery.
tagline: The story of two horny princesses
title: Forbidden Diary of the two Princesses
